headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Acid Lab Production Boosts and GTA$ Bonus for Daily Stash Houses
content:
Any chemical reaction can be sped along with the proper catalysts. That’s why Acid Lab Production Speeds are boosted by 50%. Couple that with 30% off Acid Lab Supplies and the local populace might never come down.

Plus, be on the lookout for Daily Stash Houses — successfully raiding one, wiping out the protection, and cracking the safe on three different days this week will get you a GTA$100,000 bonus (delivered within 72 hours of completion).
